Message: The user completes the submission of the form
I don't understand why my ADS, which were already approved are now being denied saying my Brand doesn't match just because I edited the AD Copy.

I'm sorry to hear that your ads are being denied after editing the ad copy. Sometimes, changes to the ad copy can trigger a re-evaluation of the entire ad, including brand consistency. I recommend reviewing the specific reasons provided in the rejection email and ensuring that all elements of your ad, including the brand name and messaging, align with NewsBreak's advertising policies. For more detailed guidance, you can check out this article: [My ad got rejected. What's next?](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next). If you need further assistance, please let me know!
